name: Heroes & Redemption
description:
Heroes & Redemption is a rogue-lite bullet-hell game where different characters and ability combinations are utilized to fight against progressively stronger enemies in order to survive. Play as the warrior Otwin Reid, who defeats the creatures and enemies that suddenly appear in the world. Acquire new companions and try to find the ones responsible for this chaos.

FEATURES


  • 4 playable characters with different ability appearances.
  • 4 types of altars with different tasks.
  • Epic boss fights.
  • 4 sets of armor that providing different powers.
  • 18 active and 20 passive abilities, a total of 38 skills.

    FIGHT AND EXPLORE


    Level up by slaughtering enemies that spawn in every direction. Make your character near immortal in this adventure by choosing one of randomly offered abilities each time you level up and by purchasing armors at the hub.

    Complete levels by fulfilling objectives at altars that appear in specific waves. Explore special locations on the maps or complete achievements to unlock new characters and abilities.

    CHARACTERS




    Start your adventure with the one that best suits you among 8 characters with different abilities and destroy your enemies.

    ALTARS





    In addition to defeating the enemies, you need to complete the tasks at the altars.
    Some of altars require you to protect a friend, while others require you to destroy the altar.

    ARMORS


    There are 4 types of armor sets in total. Some of them grants you increased protection but slows you down, while others grants you less protection but different powers. Choose the set that best suits your playstyle and destroy the enemies in your own way.

    You can earn soul crystals by completing altars or killing enemies, and you can purchase or upgrade armor sets with soul crystals.

    SPEND YOUR GOLDS AT THE HUB





    At the hub, you can purchase characters, make improvements that will strengthen your character, and even buy and upgrade pets that will accompany you on your journey.

    A WORLD FULL OF CHAOS


    Survive in the putrid dark crystal cave, embark on an expedition in old graveyard that filled with the traces of forgotten tombs, uncover the secrets of snowy village, be careful where you step in toxic sewers that filled with perilous waters and creatures, explore the old prison with ancient stone cells and annihilate all the enemies that cross your path.
